events_desc.TRI-CITY TRANSPORT: Company moves to a new, improved location

events_desc.STRONG MARKET GROWTH: General market rise over the last two months

events_desc.URANIUM ENTERPRISES: Experimental nuclear power station proves more economical than anticipated -- three electrical power companies announce plans for large-scale nuclear plants

events_desc.UNITED AUTO COMPANY: Competitor invents a new economical automatic transmission

events_desc.GROWTH CORPORATION: Corporation unexpectedly relinquishes monopoly on its major product after a lengthy anti-trust suit

events_desc.DOWNTURN IN LARGE-CAP FUNDS: Surge of profit-taking drops stock market

events_desc.VALLEY POWER: Major coal company announces reduced coal prices to electric power utilities

events_desc.URANIUM ENTERPRISES: Government suddenly announces it will no longer support ore prices because of large stockpiles

events_desc.UNITED AUTO COMPANY: Foreign car rage hits buying public -- big cars in slow demand

events_desc.METRO PROPERTIES: City Council considers company's choicest property for large industrial fair

events_desc.SHADY BROOKS DEVELOPMENT: Community steadily deteriorates -- management forced to lower rental rates to attract tenants

events_desc.URANIUM ENTERPRISES: Company prospectors find huge high-grade ore deposits

events_desc.TRI-CITY TRANSPORT: Intensive advertising campaign gains company three major, long-term contracts

events_desc.UNITED AUTO COMPANY: Strikes halt production in all eight United Auto plants as UAW and company execs fail to reach agreement on labor contract

events_desc.TRI-CITY TRANSPORT: Company lands ten-year contract with large industrial equipment corporation

events_desc.SHADY BROOKS DEVELOPMENT: Influx of personnel to new company in nearby town creates severe housing shortage

events_desc.UPTURN FOR SPECULATIVE STOCKS: War scare promotes mixed activity on Wall Street

events_desc.UNITED AUTO COMPANY: President announces expansion plans to increase productive capacity by 30%

events_desc.METRO PROPERTIES: Company's Annual Report shows net earnings off during Q4

events_desc.STRYKER DRILLING COMPANY: Land rights litigation holds up progress

events_desc.GROWTH CORPORATION: President, VP, and Chief Counsel reach retirement age

events_desc.METRO PROPERTIES: National firm leases company's largest office building

events_desc.GROWTH CORPORATION: Corporation releases high profit and sales financial report and announces plans to invest an additional $2M on special research next year

events_desc.VALLEY POWER: Public Utility Commission rejects company's request for rate hike
Commission grants permission to construct a new plant of great capacity and efficiency

events_desc.STRYKER DRILLING COMPANY: Large petroleum corporation offers to buy all assets for cash -- offer is well above book value -- directors approve and will recommend to shareholders

events_desc.TRI-CITY TRANSPORT: Large terminal destroyed by fire -- insufficient insurance on building due to company's delayed move to new location

events_desc.METRO PROPERTIES: Urban Renewal Program delayed by indecision of City Planning Commission

events_desc.GROWTH CORPORATION: Corporation announces new metal-forming process -- claims will revolutionize all metalworking industries covered by U.S. and foreign patents
Two founders and major stockholders of the corporation disagree on policy -- founder sells entire stock holdings

events_desc.UNITED AUTO COMPANY: Company announces new advanced-design auto entry in the compact car field

events_desc.GROWTH CORPORATION: Extra year-end dividend of $2 per share declared by the Board of Directors -- STOCKHOLDERS RECEIVE $2 PER SHARE
